text: The Cavern (, , also known as Helden - Himmel und HÃ¶lle) is a 1964 Italian German American World War II drama movie directed by Edgar G. Ulmer and starring John Saxon, Rosanna Schiaffino, Brian Aherne, Larry Hagman. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 war movies Category:1964 drama movies Category:1960s American drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Edgar G.
